title: John A Stamm Jr. or Bailey Pillon - 911 Calls Placed on December 19th, 2022

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: John A Stamm Jr. or Bailey Pillon - 911 Calls Placed on December 19th, 2022
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

DATE AND TIME RANGE:  On exactly December 19th, 2022 from 9 AM to 2 PM

RP INQUIRY: I'd like to know if anyone called 911 or the non-emergency number for Volusia County Sheriff's Office (VSO) mentioning ANY OF these keywords either by audio recording or documented in dispatch notes:
Bailey Pillon
John A Stamm Jr (in full or in partial)
"Nurse"
"Manager"
"Walgreens"
"Pharmacist"
"AdventHealth"
"Human Resources" or "HR"
"800 A1A, New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169" (Walgreens location)
"301 Memorial Medical Pkwy, Daytona Beach, FL 32117" (AdventHealth Daytona Beach location)

RP PHONE NUMBERS, CALLING FROM ANY of the below phone numbers and answering dispatch's question to his name being John A Stamm Jr. though he goes by either Andy or Andrew as a nickname (with or without the suffix and middle initial):
386-426-0725 (phone number of the Walgreens location noted above)
386-775-4976
386-574-1866
407-330-1233
386-366-4410
407-330-1233
386-409-0343

S1 INQUIRY THAT RP IS REFERRING TO AND CALLING TO ANY of the below phone numbers and answering dispatch to the subject being "Bailey Pillon" (in full or in partial) and/or mentioning "Inpatient Rehab" or "Human Resources" or "HR" especially but not excluding the keyword list above:
AdventHealth Daytona Beach
General Inquiries - 386-231-6000
Human Resources -  386-231-4130
Inpatient Rehab 386-231-5023
OR any other number formatted as 386-231-xxxx

If any fit all of the above criteria, I request the audio recording and dispatch documentation, if it exists.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Bailey Pillon
